messages.title: Standing up for Manchester Gorton
messages.content: I have a record of standing up for our area and getting things done. I have lived in Manchester for over 40 years and raised my family here and I'm determined to make sure we get our fair share.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will stand up to the Tories and fight for a fairer society.
We will prioritize jobs and living standards, fighting for every household to have a decent standard of living.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Brexit that works for everyone
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We respect the referendum result and will fight for a Brexit that protects all our futures.
We believe in properly funded public services and will work to protect our NHS, schools and policing.
We are committed to cleaner, greener communities and will fight for action on air pollution and climate change.

issues.brexitEurope: We respect the referendum result and will fight for a Brexit that protects all our futures.
issues.economy: We will prioritize jobs and living standards, fighting for every household to have a decent standard of living.
issues.education: We will work to protect our schools.
issues.environment: We are committed to cleaner, greener communities and will fight for action on air pollution and climate change.
issues.governance: We will stand up to the Tories and fight for a fairer society.
issues.health: We will work to protect our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Manchester for over 40 years and raised my family here and I'm determined to make sure we get our fair share.

politicalExperience.achievements: As your MEP I've fought for British jobs, workers' rights and protecting our environment.

endorsements.endorsement: Afzal is a Manchester man through and through, and I know his experience, passion and commitment to our city will make him a great MP for Manchester Gorton.

images.caption: Afzal with local residents and campaigners
Afzal campaigning for better jobs and living standards
